hero.title: Google Maps for React
hero.subtitle: The most popular React library for Google Maps. Build beautiful, interactive maps with ease using our comprehensive component library.

features.title: Why Choose React Google Maps API?
features.subtitle: Everything you need to build professional map applications

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of developers using React Google Maps API

login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: Welcome back! Please sign in to your account.
login.validationError: Please enter a valid email and password

signup.title: Create Account
signup.subtitle: Join us today! Create your account to get started.

forgotPassword.title: Reset Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.successText: Check your email for a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.validationError: Please enter a valid email address
forgotPassword.sendError: Failed to send reset email. Please try again.

resetPassword.title: Set New Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password below.
resetPassword.successText: Your password has been successfully updated.
resetPassword.error: Failed to reset password. Please try again.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Get a commercial license to use React Google Maps API in your production applications.

openSource.title: Open Source Usage
openSource.description: React Google Maps API is free for open source projects. If you're building something for the community, you can use it without a license.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Manage your licenses and account settings

empty.title: No licenses found
empty.description: You haven't purchased any licenses yet. Get started by purchasing a commercial license.

checkoutSuccess.title: Payment Successful!
checkoutSuccess.subtitle: Thank you for your purchase. Your license has been generated.
